member.name: IMFDeviceTransformCallback.OnBufferSent
member.summary: Called when system-allocated frame buffers are sent to the device driver.
member.param: The attributes containing the callback data. The System-allocated frame buffer information is stored in the attribute with the MF_DMFT_FRAME_BUFFER_INFO key.
The identifier of the device pin to which the frame buffers are sent.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFDeviceTransformCallback
member.summary: Implement this callback to receive notifications when system-allocated frame buffers are sent to the device driver.
